column4: My computer says I need admin rights to install Zoom. Can you help?
column5: Follow approval workflow; avoid bypassing admin controls; escalate to IT.

column4: My work email stopped syncing on my phone. What should I check?
column5: Check network, credentials, MFA, mailbox settings; avoid telling user to delete corporate profile without guidance.

column4: I can’t access the shared drive anymore. It says 'permission denied'.
column5: Check permissions, membership, recent changes; escalate if needed.

column4: My computer is acting weird after clicking a pop-up. Did I get a virus?
column5: Do not run random tools; report to IT security; disconnect if severe; scan using approved software.

column4: My meetings disappeared from Outlook. How can I restore them?
column5: Check filters, view settings, deleted items, sync status.

column4: My keyboard suddenly stopped working. What should I try?
column5: Check cable/battery, restart, different port; avoid suggesting disassembly.

column4: Wi-Fi keeps dropping in the office. Is there anything I can do?
column5: Check signal strength, move locations, restart device; escalate to IT network team.

column4: Can I store client files on my USB drive temporarily?
column5: Explain data handling policy; recommend approved encrypted storage only.

column4: Windows keeps forcing me to restart for updates. Can I delay it?
column5: Explain update policy; safe deferral options; avoid disabling updates.

column4: My account keeps locking out every morning. What’s causing it?
column5: Explain stale credentials, mapped drives, mobile sync; check logs; escalate.
